meanings.definition: Regarded with great respect or admiration.
meanings.sent1: She felt honoured to receive the award at the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The veteran was honoured for his bravery in the war.
meanings.sent3: The little girl felt honoured when her drawing was displayed on the fridge.
meanings.sent4: The majestic oak tree stood honoured among the other trees in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's dedication to her students was truly honoured by the school community.

meanings.definition: Accepted or received with gratitude or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: He was honoured to be invited to the exclusive event.
meanings.sent2: The chef was honoured by the positive reviews of his new restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked honoured as it received a special treat for being well-behaved.
meanings.sent4: The old book was honoured with a special place on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent5: The artist felt honoured when her painting was purchased by a collector.
